sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO work_company (company_idx, student_idx, company_name, company_addr, company_section, longitude, latitude) VALUES (#company_idx#, #student_idx#, #company_name#, #company_addr#, #company_section#, #longitude#, #latitude#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM work_company WHERE company_idx = #company_idx# AND student_idx = #student_idx#
sqlMap.select: SELECT company_idx, student_idx, company_name, company_addr, company_section, longitude, latitude FROM work_company where company_idx = #company_idx#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE work_company SET student_idx = #student_idx#, company_name = #company_name#, company_addr = #company_addr#, company_section = #company_section#, longitude = #longitude#, latitude = #latitude# WHERE company_idx = #company_idx#
sqlMap.select: select a.fiveRankCity, a.cnt from (select substr(company_addr, 1, instr(company_addr, ' ', '1', '1')) as fiveRankCity, count(*) AS cnt from work_company group by substr(company_addr, 1, instr(company_addr, ' ', '1', '1')) order by 2 desc) a where rownum <=5
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO notice_company (company_idx, company_name, company_addr, company_salary, company_section, recruit_intake, longitude, latitude) VALUES (ncompany_idx_seq.nextval, #company_name#, #company_addr#, #company_salary#, #company_section#,#recruit_intake#,'0', '0')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE notice_company SET company_name = #company_name#, company_addr = #company_addr#, company_salary = #company_salary#, company_section = #company_section#, recruit_intake = #recruit_intake#, longitude = #longitude#, latitude = #latitude# WHERE company_idx = #company_idx#
